rules_text:
Api is all colors.
When Api enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card and put it into your hand.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform Api. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
As long as it's your turn, lands you control have indestructible and haste.
{T}: Untap up to three lands you control. They become 1/1 Spirit creatures with flying until end of turn that are still lands.
notes: When Cenari, Who Desires enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another Insect. If you do, search your library for an Insect card, reveal it and put it into your hand.
